Hemanth Reddy Nomula 
211 Lenora St Apt 219, Seattle, Washington, 98121 | +1(646) 577-5617 |hemanthreddy620
@gmail.com 
 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
 
Programming Languages: C, C++, Java, Python (Numpy, Pandas), SQL 
WebTechnologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ASP.NET, AJAX, Web Services, jQuery, JSON, XML 
WebFramework: AngularJS, Node.js, Flask, Spring Framework, Django, Express.js 
Databases: MySQL, NoSQL, SQL PLUS, MongoDB, Google Firebase, Oracle, Redshift 
Cloud Services: AWS, Azure, Apache Tomcat, Heroku 
Technologies: Git, Docker, Jenkins, Tableau, PowerBI, Tensorflow, VS Code, PyCharm, Hibernate, Pytorch, Jira, Trello, Swagger, Terraform, 
Cassandra 
 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
 
Software Developer, Anstek Inc., Plano, TX                                                                                                                                        May 2024 - Present

Software Developer, Anstek Inc., Plano, TX                                                                                                                                        May 2024 - Present 
● Developed and maintained enterprise applications using Spring and Angular frameworks, ensuring performance, scalability, and adherence to 
best practices. 
● Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including business analysts and solution architects, to translate requirements into high-quality, 
functional code. 
● Built streaming applications using Kafka Streams API for real-time analytics and data enrichment. 
● Conducted unit testing, troubleshooting, and performance optimization to ensure code quality and maintainability. 
● Managed project timelines and priorities, ensuring on-time delivery within budget constraints while aligning with organizational objectives.

● Managed project timelines and priorities, ensuring on-time delivery within budget constraints while aligning with organizational objectives. 
● Designed and optimized Cassandra data models with efficient partitioning and clustering strategies for high throughput. 
● Managed Apache Cassandra clusters for distributed, fault-tolerant, and highly available data storage. 
● Engaged in system architecture design, simulation, and prototyping to enhance software solutions and align with business goals. 
 
Software Engineer, Software Concepts LLC, Carrollton, TX                                                                                                           Nov 2023 - Apr 2024 
● Analyzed and improved Docker images using Dockerfiles, deploying and running applications in isolated environments, enhancing scalability 
and resource utilization. Organized repositories on Docker Hub and private registries for version control and distribution.

and resource utilization. Organized repositories on Docker Hub and private registries for version control and distribution. 
● Integrated Flask applications with databases using SQLAlchemy ORM, optimizing data manipulation and operational efficiency; increased data 
retrieval speed by 40% and reduced server load by 25%. 
● Developed and managed real-time data pipelines using Apache Kafka to enable event-driven architecture for scalable applications. 
● Launched and refined virtual servers (instances) on Amazon EC2, optimizing instance types and configuring security groups. Unified real-time 
data processing with Spark Streaming, processing live data streams from sources like Kafka and Flume. 
● Implemented Hibernate second-level caching with EhCache and Redis, improving application performance by reducing database load. 
● Used Git to manage and track changes in the codebase, ensuring collaboration and version control across development teams.

● Used Git to manage and track changes in the codebase, ensuring collaboration and version control across development teams. 
                                                      
Full Stack Developer, OneStopD Solutions Inc., Phoenix, AZ  May 2022 - Oct 2023 
● 
Utilized Spring's Dependency Injection to manage object creation and wiring and developed web applications using Spring MVC. Employed 
Spark's core abstraction, RDDs, for distributed data processing and handling data transformations and actions.
 
● 
Managed and stored 5TB of data in Amazon S3, implementing versioning and lifecycle policies, enhancing data security, and reducing storage 
costs by 20% annually.
 
● Developed automated ETL workflows in Informatica Workflow Manager, increasing data integration efficiency by 40%. 
● Integrated Hibernate with Spring Transaction Management for consistent data handling and rollback mechanisms in distributed systems.

● Integrated Hibernate with Spring Transaction Management for consistent data handling and rollback mechanisms in distributed systems. 
● Leveraged PyTorch’s DataLoader and Dataset classes for efficient data loading and preprocessing in machine learning. 
Simplified client-side 
routing with Angular Router for seamless navigation and managed project timelines, deliverables, and team coordination to meet project goals.
 
 
Junior Software Developer, Lorvent Solutions, Hyderabad, India  June 2019 - July 2021 
● Streamlined responsive web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for optimal user experiences across various devices. Utilized 
business intelligence tools like Tableau, Power BI, and Looker to create reports and dashboards from data warehouses. 
● 
Extracted data from relational databases, NoSQL databases, APIs, flat files, and cloud storage and performed CRUD operations using NoSQL 
database queries and APIs.

● 
Extracted data from relational databases, NoSQL databases, APIs, flat files, and cloud storage and performed CRUD operations using NoSQL 
database queries and APIs. 
● Integrated Cassandra with tools like Apache Spark for large-scale data processing and analytics.  
● Engineered comprehensive reports and interactive dashboards with Tableau, Power BI, and Looker, sourced from data warehouses; empowered 
data-driven decision making, resulting in a 20% boost in sales conversions and a 15% decrease in churn rate. 
● Generated relational databases using Amazon RDS, supporting MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, and Oracle. Loaded transformed data into 
target data warehouses, data lakes, or databases and assessed data mapping documents to define transformations and data flow. 
 
PROJECT EXPERIENCE 
 
FitnessClub Application Node JS, Angular, Express JS, MongoDB May 2024

PROJECT EXPERIENCE 
 
FitnessClub Application Node JS, Angular, Express JS, MongoDB May 2024 
● Using Angular, I designed an intuitive and responsive user interface to ensure a seamless user experience. On the backend, I leveraged Node.js 
and Express.js to create robust RESTful APIs, while MongoDB served as the database for efficient storage and retrieval of user data.. 
 
Sample Size Calculation Application, NJIT                                     Jan 2022 - Mar 2022 
● Designed a report generation feature that produces detailed summaries of the sample size calculations, including graphical representations and 
step-by-step explanations, exported into various formats such as PDF and Excel. 
 
Intelligent Virtual Personal Assistant, NJIT Sep 2021 - Dec 2021

● Mentored a team to devise an innovative strategy for including a disease prediction feature in a Windows Enterprise virtual personal assistant 
via voice commands using Natural Language Processing. 
 
Image-Based Fashion Recommendation, Gitam Jan 2020 - Mar 2020 
● Revised a recommendation system suggesting visually similar products and outfits based on a base product image. 
● 
The system was trained on 80k images and employed ResNet-50 transfer learning and Spotify's ANNOY to recommend fashion products.
